query:
UPDATE sidebar_items SET 
  label = CASE id
    WHEN 1 THEN 'Dashboard'
    WHEN 2 THEN 'Cronograma'
    WHEN 3 THEN 'Questões'
    WHEN 4 THEN 'Simulados'
    WHEN 5 THEN 'Materiais'
    WHEN 6 THEN 'Fórum'
    WHEN 7 THEN 'Estatísticas'
    WHEN 8 THEN 'Meu Perfil'
  END,
  path = CASE id
    WHEN 1 THEN '/dashboard'
    WHEN 2 THEN '/metas/cronograma'
    WHEN 3 THEN '/questoes'
    WHEN 4 THEN '/simulados'
    WHEN 5 THEN '/materiais'
    WHEN 6 THEN '/forum'
    WHEN 7 THEN '/estatisticas'
    WHEN 8 THEN '/perfil'
  END,
  icon = CASE id
    WHEN 1 THEN 'LayoutDashboard'
    WHEN 2 THEN 'Calendar'
    WHEN 3 THEN 'FileQuestion'
    WHEN 4 THEN 'GraduationCap'
    WHEN 5 THEN 'BookOpen'
    WHEN 6 THEN 'MessageSquare'
    WHEN 7 THEN 'BarChart3'
    WHEN 8 THEN 'User'
  END,
  visivel = 1
WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 8;
